questions.question: Balance the equation C2H5(OH)NH2COO + H2SO4 → (NH4)2SO4 + SO2 + 14 CO2 + H2O
Which one of the following inorganic forms of nitrogen predominates in the soil?

explanations.a: N2 is present but not in usable form.
explanations.b: Correct. Nitrate (NO3⁻) is the predominant usable inorganic form.
explanations.c: Nitrite (NO2) is less stable in soil.
